article.name: Access to Message Revoked
article.title: Access to Message Revoked
article.body:
If you see the message below when trying to access an email, then the sender has revoked access to the package or removed your email address from the email access list.

If you need access, you will need to contact the sender of the email. Support does not have access to do this.

images.alt:
This image displays an application error notification box, likely an inline alert or dialog component.

**UI Elements and Layout:**
*   **Context:** The component uses a high-contrast layout (black text on a white background) and is bordered by a thin dark line.
*   **Icon:** A standard critical error icon is positioned on the left. This icon consists of a large, red 'X' enclosed within a red circular outline, signifying an unrecoverable error or denial of service.

**Text and Context:**
*   **Error Message:** The accompanying text is displayed in black, standard font, indicating a security or access restriction failure.
*   **Full Text Transcription:** "Access to message "TJ-181231-100523" denied because it has been revoked."
*   **Context:** The message communicates that access permissions to a specific object, identified by the unique message ID **TJ-181231-100523**, have been denied due to the previous revocation of the message's access rights.
images.context: er has revoked access to the package or removed your email address from the email access list.
